Action.Name: ListCtrl.InsertItem
Action.Description: Inserts the row of a ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.InsertColumn
Action.Description: Inserts the column of a ListCtrl object.

Arg.Name: Header
Arg.Description: The column header of the column.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetRedraw
Action.Description: Sets the redraw all items of a ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetItemText
Action.Description: Sets the item text of a ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetFocus
Action.Description: Sets the focus of a ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.DeleteAllItems
Action.Description: Deletes the all items of a ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.DeleteColumn
Action.Description: Deletes the column of a ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.DeleteItem
Action.Description: Deletes the item of a ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetItemCount
Action.Description: Gets the count of the ListCtrl object's items.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetColumnCount
Action.Description: Gets the count of the ListCtrl object's columns.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetColumnData
Action.Description: Gets the data of the ListCtrl object's column.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetColumnOrder
Action.Description: Gets column position in the ListCtrl object's display order array.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetColumnOrder
Action.Description: Sets column position in the ListCtrl object's display order array.

Arg.Name: Order
Arg.Description: The order number to set position.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetColumnWidth
Action.Description: Gets the width of the ListCtrl object's width.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetColumnHeading
Action.Description: Gets the heading of the ListCtrl object's column.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetItemText
Action.Description: Gets the text of the ListCtrl object's item.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetFocusCell
Action.Description: Gets the focus cell of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetFocusRow
Action.Description: Gets the focus row of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetHotItem
Action.Description: Gets the hot item of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetCheckBoxOnHeader
Action.Description: Creates the checkbox object on the ListCtrl object's header control.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetCheck
Action.Description: Gets the check state of the ListCtrl object's item.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetCheck
Action.Description: Sets the check state of the ListCtrl object's item.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetCheckAllItems
Action.Description: Sets the check state of the ListCtrl object's all items.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetColumnWidthAuto
Action.Description: Sets the column's width auto of the ListCtrl object.

Arg.Name: IncludeHeader
Arg.Description: set true to include header of the column.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.InsertColumnTrait
Action.Description: Inserts the column trait of a ListCtrl object.

Arg.Name: Header
Arg.Description: The column header of the column.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetColumnTrait
Action.Description: Gets the column trait of a ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.CreateComboTrait
Action.Description: Creates the column trait of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.ComboTraitAddItem
Action.Description: Adds the item of the column trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.ComboTraitSetMaxItems
Action.Description: Sets the max items of the column trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.ComboTraitSetSingleClickEdit
Action.Description: Sets the single click edit of the column trait.

Arg.Name: SingleClick
Arg.Description: set true to first click edit.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.ComboTraitSetShowDropDown
Action.Description: Sets the drop down property of the column trait.

Arg.Name: bShow
Arg.Description: set true to show drop down on the combo trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.ComboClearFixedItems
Action.Description: Clears the fixed items of the column trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.CreateMultilineEditTrait
Action.Description: Creates the multiline edit trait of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MultilineEditTraitGetLimitText
Action.Description: Gets the limit text of the multiline edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MultilineEditTraitGetMaxLines
Action.Description: Gets the max lines number of the multiline edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MultilineEditTraitSetSingleClickEdit
Action.Description: Sets single click edit for the multiline edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MultilineEditTraitSetLimitText
Action.Description: Sets the limit text for the multiline edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MultilineEditTraitSetMaxLines
Action.Description: Sets the max lines for the multiline edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.CreateMaskedEditTrait
Action.Description: Creates the masked edit trait of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MaskedEditTraitSetSingleClickEdit
Action.Description: Sets single click edit for the masked edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MaskedEditSetMask
Action.Description: Sets the mask of the masked edit trait.

Arg.Name: Mask
Arg.Description: the text value to set mask.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MaskedEditGetMask
Action.Description: Gets the mask of the masked edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MaskedEditSetPromptSymbol
Action.Description: Sets the prompt symbol of the masked edit trait.

Arg.Name: PromptSymbol
Arg.Description: the character value to set prompt symbol.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MaskedEditGetPromptSymbol
Action.Description: Gets the prompt symbol of the masked edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.CreateEditTrait
Action.Description: Creates the edit trait of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.EditTraitSetLimitText
Action.Description: Sets the limit text of the edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.EditTraitGetLimitText
Action.Description: Gets the limit text of the edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.EditTraitSetSingleClickEdit
Action.Description: Sets single click edit for the edit trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.CreateDateTimeTrait
Action.Description: Creates the datetime trait of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.DateTimeSetFormat
Action.Description: Sets the time format of the datetime trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.DateTimeGetFormat
Action.Description: Gets the time format of the datetime trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.DateTimeSetSingleClickEdit
Action.Description: Sets single click edit for the datetime trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.DateTimeSetTime
Action.Description: Sets the time of the datetime trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.DateTimeSetToggleSelection
Action.Description: Sets the toggle selection of the datetime trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.CreateHyperLinkTrait
Action.Description: Creates the hyperlink trait of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.HyperLinkSetSingleClickEdit
Action.Description: Sets single click edit for the hyperlink trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.HyperLinkSetShellApplication
Action.Description: Sets shell application of the hyperlink trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.HyperLinkSetShellFilePrefix
Action.Description: Sets the shell file prefix of the hyperlink trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.HyperLinkSetShellFileSuffix
Action.Description: Sets the shell file suffix of the hyperlink trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.HyperLinkGetShellFilePrefix
Action.Description: Gets the shell file prefix of the hyperlink trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.HyperLinkGetShellFileSuffix
Action.Description: Gets the shell file suffix of the hyperlink trait.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SelectRow
Action.Description: Selects/Deselects the row of a ListCtrl object.

Arg.Name: Select
Arg.Description: set true to select/deselect the row.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SelectAllRows
Action.Description: Selects/Deselects the all rows of a ListCtrl object.

Arg.Name: Select
Arg.Description: set true to select/deselect the row.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetCellBackColor
Action.Description: Sets the back color of the ListCtrl object's cell.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetCellTextColor
Action.Description: Sets the text color of the ListCtrl object's cell.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetTooltipTitle
Action.Description: Sets the title of the ListCtrl object's tooltip.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetTooltipText
Action.Description: Sets the text of the ListCtrl object's tooltip.

Arg.Name: Text
Arg.Description: The text value of the tooltip.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetBkColor
Action.Description: Sets the background color of the ListCtrl object.

Arg.Name: Color
Arg.Description: The color value of the object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetBkColor
Action.Description: Gets the color of the ListCtrl object's background.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.IsCellEditorOpen
Action.Description: Returns true if a cell editor is open or false if it is not.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.RedrawItems
Action.Description: Redraws from the first to last items of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetColumnWidth
Action.Description: Sets the width of the ListCtrl object's column.

Arg.Name: Col
Arg.Description: The column number to set the width.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetFocusRow
Action.Description: Sets the focus of the ListCtrl object's row.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetFocusCell
Action.Description: Sets the focus of the ListCtrl object's cell.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetHotItem
Action.Description: Sets the hot of the ListCtrl object's item.

Arg.Name: Index
Arg.Description: The index number to set hot item.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetItemData
Action.Description: Sets the data of the ListCtrl object's item.

Arg.Name: Item
Arg.Description: The item number to set the data.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetItemData
Action.Description: Gets the data of the ListCtrl object's item.

Arg.Name: Item
Arg.Description: The item number to get the data.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.EnableTooltips
Action.Description: Enables/Disables the tooltips of the ListCtrl object.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: set true to enable the tooltips.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetFont
Action.Description: Sets the font of the ListCtrl object.

Arg.Name: FontSize
Arg.Description: The size of the font object.

Arg.Name: Weigth
Arg.Description: the weigth of the font object.

Arg.Name: Italic
Arg.Description: set true to italic font object.

Arg.Name: Underline
Arg.Description: set true to underline font object.

Arg.Name: StrikeOut
Arg.Description: set true to strikeout font object.

Arg.Name: FontName
Arg.Description: the name of the font object.

Arg.Name: Charset
Arg.Description: the charset of the font object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.FindItem
Action.Description: Finds the item in the ListCtrl object.

Arg.Name: Text
Arg.Description: the text value to find item.

Arg.Name: nStart
Arg.Description: the first index to find item.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.EnsureVisible
Action.Description: Ensures the visible item of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.UpdateWindow
Action.Description: Updates the ListCtrl object's window.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetSelectedItems
Action.Description: Gets the selected items of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetCheckedItems
Action.Description: Gets the checked items of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetSelectedCount
Action.Description: Gets the selected count of the ListCtrl object's items.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.IsItemSelected
Action.Description: Returns true if a specific item is selected, or false if it's not selected.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.EnsureColumnVisible
Action.Description: Ensures the visible column of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.EditCell
Action.Description: Edits the cell of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.ShowColumn
Action.Description: Shows the column of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.IsColumnVisible
Action.Description: Returns true if a specific column is visible, or false if it's not visible.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.MoveFocusCell
Action.Description: Shifts the cell focus left or right in the same row.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.CopyToClipBoard
Action.Description: Copys the current cell text to the clipboard.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GroupByColumn
Action.Description: Groups the all items by the column.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.IsGroupViewEnabled
Action.Description: Returns true if the groupview is visible, or false if it's not visible.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.IsGroupStateEnabled
Action.Description: Checks if it is possible to modify the collapse state of a group. This is only possible in Windows Vista or later.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.RemoveAllGroups
Action.Description: Removes the all groups on the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetGroupHeader
Action.Description: Retrieves the group header title of a group.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.CheckEntireGroup
Action.Description: Update the checkbox of the label column (first column)

Action.Name: ListCtrl.ExpandAllGroups
Action.Description: Expands all groups

Action.Name: ListCtrl.CollapseAllGroups
Action.Description: Collapses all groups

Action.Name: ListCtrl.DeleteEntireGroup
Action.Description: Deletes the group and its items of the ListCtrl object.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SortColumn
Action.Description: Changes the row sorting in regard to the specified column.

Arg.Name: Ascending
Arg.Description: Perform sorting in ascending or descending order.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetSortArrow
Action.Description: Puts a sort-icon in the column header of the specified column.

Arg.Name: Ascending
Arg.Description: Should the arrow be up or down.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.GetColumnTraitState
Action.Description: Maintaining column visible state, etc.(Returning values: bSortable, bEditable, nMaxWidth, nMinWidth, nOrgPosition, nOrgWidth, bResizable, bVisible)

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetItemCount
Action.Description: Prepares a list view control for adding a large number of items.

Arg.Name: nItems
Arg.Description: Number of items that the control will ultimately contain.

Action.Name: ListCtrl.SetEmptyMarkupText
Action.Description: Updates the markup text displayed when the list control is empty.

Arg.Name: MarkupText
Arg.Description: Text to display when list control is empty.
